And I guess Lou is too close to Presley to, you know, see the possibilities in, you know, in politics for Presley. But once they wouldn't take it, I said, well, hell, I'm going to have to write it myself, you know. So I sat down and wrote it, you know. It's like you – it's just one of those ideas that bothers you until you write it, you know. I mean, and once I knew I had to write it, then I'd sit down and I did just enough research on Ike and just enough on Presley to know about how they would be probably about it and wrote the story and sent it off. Yeah, they liked it. Yeah, they liked it well enough. They said they wouldn't have written it like that. And I said, well, you could have. But, yeah, it's just one of those.
